entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

entry.title: Vythm VJ - Music Visualizer DJ
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • All features and modesï¼š$44.99 â†’ $29.99 [$29.99 ~ $44.99]

Application Description

--- Experience Your Music with Vythm --- Unlock the potential of music visualization with Vythm! Vythm is a versatile music visualization app that allows you to create visual artworks in harmony with your selected music. It includes a variety of unique visualization modes, including Equalizer, Mandala, Shapes, Fluids, Psychedelic, Dreaming, and more. Choose a background and apply image effects to personalize your visualization completely. --- Your Vision, Your Visualization --- Vythm provides you with numerous options to realize your creative vision: - Over 100 carefully selected backgrounds. - MIDI input for precise visual control. - NDI streaming support for sharing your creations. - Real-time image effects like color correction, bloom, chromatic aberration, and more. - Size, rotation, and orientation adjustments. And much more! The Equalizer, Rhythm, and Peer modes are available for free, while other modes can be unlocked through a subscription. --- Input Formats --- Select your music from a variety of sources: - Import any mp3 or m4a files. - Access your iTunes library (Please note that Apple Music is not currently supported). - Utilize your device's microphone, with sensitivity adjustments for various use cases. - Enjoy three preselected songs for quick inspiration. --- Record Your Masterpiece --- Vythm offers a recording feature that enables you to share or save your creations. Revisit your immersive visual world at your convenience or dazzle your audience with your artistic masterpiece. --- Share Your Thoughts --- Our top priority is to provide you with the best possible experience. If you encounter issues or have ideas for new features, please do not hesitate to contact us at info@mkgames.org. If you enjoy the app, we would greatly appreciate your feedback and a review! Thank you for choosing Vythm! Download and experience Vythm (Music Visualization 2024 / Audio Visualizer) today! Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: DeviceMirror Lite -Screen Cast
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • DeviceMirror Lite Lifetimeï¼š$17.99 â†’ $14.99 [$12.99 ~ $17.99]

Application Description

DeviceMirror Lite can use Wi-Fi connection to mirror the screen and sound of your iOS device to the computer. With it, you can watch online HD movies on the big screen, share game videos on the big screen, listen to music on the phone on the computer, and record online courses. , Demo demo video recording, App usage tutorial video recording, etc. The main function: 1 Support Wi-Fi connection for mirroring (Support AirPlay protocol,no need to install App on iOS device). 2 Support multiple devices to mirror at the same time. 3 Support video recording. 4 Support real-time screenshots. 5 Support horizontal screen projection to watch online movies. 6 Support more than 200 online websites such as YouTube to air-play video to the computer for playback. 7 Support to use Mac computer as the keyboard of iOS device for input 8 Support to cut MP4 or MOV format video. 9 Support to extract and convert the audio in the video to MP3 or M4R format audio. 10 Supports cutting audio in mp3, m4a, and m4r formats. 11 Supports audio recording with computer microphone, computer speakers and computer microphone+speaker combination. Pay attention: Since OSX 12 Monterey may turn on the system's AirPlay service by default, if the system AirPlay service is turned on, the Wi-Fi connection of DeviceMirror will not work properly.You need to disable the AirPlay receiver in System Preferences->Sharing->AirPlay Receiver System version support: OSX 10.13 and above

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: DeviceMirror -Screen Mirroring
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$19.99 â†’ $17.99 [$14.99 ~ $19.99]ï¼‰

Application Description

DeviceMirror can use a USB or wifi connection to mirror the screen and sound of your iOS device to the computer. With it, you can watch online HD movies on the big screen, share game videos on the big screen, listen to music on the phone on the computer, and record online courses. Demo demo video recording, App usage tutorial video recording. The main function: 1 Support USB connection and wifi connection for mirroring (Support AirPlay protocol,no need to install App on iOS device). 2 Support multiple devices to mirror at the same time. 3 USB connection supports 720P, 1080P, 4K, HD display and recording (1080P and 4K are supported by OSX 10.15 and above) and supports pause recording and resume recording. 4 Wi-Fi connection supports display and recording in four resolutions: HD-Retina, HD, HD-Medium, and 1080P. 5 The recording format supports MP4, MOV, GIF. 6 Support real-time screenshots in PNG and JPEG formats. 7 Support horizontal screen projection to watch online movies. 8 Support to play online movies in the air. 9 Support more than 200 online websites such as YouTube to air-play video to the computer for playback 10 Support to use Mac computer as the keyboard of iOS device for input 11 Support Mac computer and iOS device to share clipboard 12 Support to cut the video in MP4 or MOV format 13 Support to convert the audio in the video to MP3 or M4R format audio 14 Supports cutting audio in mp3, m4a, and m4r formats. 15 Supports audio recording with computer microphone, computer speakers and computer microphone+speaker combination. Pay attention: Since OSX 12 Monterey may turn on the system's AirPlay service by default, if the system AirPlay service is turned on, the Wi-Fi connection of DeviceMirror will not work properly.You need to disable the AirPlay receiver in System Preferences->Sharing->AirPlay Receiver System version support: OSX 10.13 and above

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: AudioTunes - FLAC, APE, WMA Converter
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$3.99 â†’ Free [Free ~ $3.99]ï¼‰

Application Description

On sale. Original $4.99. *** Don't forget to download "Total Video Converter Pro" which converts any video and burns DVD. 50% OFF! *** AudioTunes is a powerful audio converter that converts common audios (MP3ï¼Œwavï¼Œflacï¼Œapeï¼Œwmaï¼Œamrï¼Œac3ï¼Œau etc) to iTunes simply by 3 clicks. You can play those audios on your Mac or download them to the iOS devices. Key features: * Easy to Use (No Complicated Setting) Only 3 steps: Add files - Select the format - Click â€œConvertâ€ button * Synchronize converted audios to iTunes automatically * Convert audios formats that iTunes does not support into iTunes 1. Input formats: MP3ï¼Œwavï¼Œflacï¼Œapeï¼Œwmaï¼Œamrï¼Œac3ï¼Œau ,etc. 2.Output formats: Almost all formats that iTunes supported, such as mp3, aac, m4a, Apple Lossless, aiff * Batch conversion AudioTunes supports batch convert numerous files in a short time. * Save converted audios to custom directory * Drag & Drop is supported.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Hide Mouse Cursor
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$0.99 â†’ Free [Free ~ $0.99]ï¼‰

Application Description

This app is a tool designed for users to hide the mouse cursor, which is particularly suitable for full-screen presentations, video playback or games, allowing users to focus on the content without being disturbed by the cursor, including one-click hiding/showing the cursor, shortcut key support, and custom settings.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Wink: Video Enhancer & Editor
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Yearly Auto-renew VIPï¼š$59.99 â†’ $40.99 [$40.99 ~ $59.99]

Application Description

Wink l Make any low-quality video & photo into HD/Ultra HD/4K with before/after comparisons. l Making video editing easier than ever! l Various creative video transition effects enhance final results! l Fine-tune your selfies with video retouch tools to highlight your day! Video ï¼† Photo Enhance - Video Enhancer: Enhance portraits and selfies to stunning output. - 4K Upscaler: AI-powered 4K upscaling for enhanced video quality. - Stabilize: Smooth out shaky footage for professional-looking videos. - Noise reduction: Reduce video noise and grain for professional-looking results. - AI Color: Give your video a vibrant, fresh look with our easy-to-use color enhancement tool Video Retouch - Manual Face Slimming: Adjust your facial features as you wish - Body Shape: Achieve a supermodel physique! - Stylish Makeup: Providing a range of natural makeup - Face Editor: Remove acne, Face Plump, Skin tone ... and more! - Whiten Teeth: Say goodbye to brown teeth and show off your smile! Video Editing - Professional Editing: Color, Crop, Speed, Split, Mirror, Soundtrack and more! - Templates: Easily apply to create high-quality vlogs - Quality Restoration: Clear AI-enhanced video restoration! - Effects: Adds texts, stickers, and transitions to enhance your videos - Automatic Subtitle: Utilizes intelligent voice recognition for easy text inputting AI Captions - Accurate AI subtitles for your videos in seconds - Support Bilingual: Create dual-language subtitles for your videos - Support 8 languages Wink VIP - Access exclusive VIP features Wink offers a wide range of exclusive VIP features to enhance retouching experience. We are committed to providing you with an improved service. We look forward to your continuing support. - Subscriptions Wink VIP-Monthly Subscription offers a subscription period of one month. Wink VIP-Annual subscription entails a 12-month period. *The subscription price is determined based on the information provided in the in-app purchase (iAP) application. - Instructions for Payment and Cancellation "Payment" will be credited to your iTunes account once you have confirmed and paid for your subscription. "Renewal" subscriptions for "Monthly/Annual" plans are automatically renewed and will incur charges to your iTunes account following your purchase confirmation. The subscription will be automatically renewed. To cancel it, please disable the automatic renewal at least 24 hours before the subscription period ends. Within 24 hours before the subscription cycle expires, Apple will automatically debit your iTunes account, extending your subscription for a new cycle. "To cancel your subscription, kindly navigate to the "Settings" section on your iPhone, click on "Apple ID," proceed to the "Subscription" screen, and choose "Wink" to terminate your subscription. - Agreement Terms of Serviceï¼šhttps://pro.meitu.com/wink-cut/agreements/common/service-global.html?lang=en Privacy Policyï¼šhttps://pro.meitu.com/wink-cut/agreements/common/policy-global.html?lang=en

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: djay - DJ App & AI Mixer
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Full Access to PROï¼š$29.99 â†’ $6.99 [$6.99 ~ $29.99]

Application Description

*** Apple Design Award Winner 2024 *** Welcome to djay! The #1 DJ app and winner of multiple Apple Design Awards now integrates with Apple Music - mix over 100 million songs instantly! djay transforms your iOS device into a full-featured DJ system. Seamlessly integrated with your music library, djay allows you to mix your favorite songs and playlists. You can perform live, remix tracks, or enable Automix mode to let djay create a seamless mix for you automatically. Whether you are a professional DJ or a beginner who just loves to play with music, djay offers you the most intuitive yet powerful DJ experience on an iOS device. entry.title: MWeb Pro
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$34.99 â†’ $17.99 [$17.99 ~ $34.99]ï¼‰

Application Description

MWeb was born in 2015. It is a writing, note-taking and publishing app focusing on Markdown. If you like Markdown or text writing, We highly recommend you try MWeb. This is MWeb Pro, which has just one more static website generation feature than MWeb. MWeb is composed of a complete and stable editor, a Folders mode for managing documents, a Library mode specifically for notes, and a document publishing and sharing function set, with a total of four modules. The characteristic of MWeb's software is that it selects the best technology for each platform. It is built using AppKit on macOS and UIKit on iOS/iPadOS. The following is a brief introduction to these four modules. If you are interested, you can continue reading. ## Editor features Here are some of the key features of an editor: * Base on CommonMark syntax and GitHub Flavored Markdown (GFM) extended syntax, supporting TOC, tables, code blocks, math formulas, task lists, footnotes, etc. * Display the text of the Markdown document completely without any deletion. * Images can be displayed directly in the Editor, supporting jpg, png, gif, webP, HEIC and etc. * Math formulas, mermaid and Echarts drawings can be previewed in the editor. * You can set your favorite font or multiple fonts for writing. * You can choose from 11 light themes and 21 dark themes, and also support custom themes. * There is a menu to facilitate the input of Markdown syntax, and a special Markdown syntax keyboard is also provided in iOS. * Convenient tools for generating and formatting Markdown table syntax. * You can view the outline and word count of Markdown documents. * Markdown documents can be previewed and support Editor & Preview mode. ## Folders mode The first requirement of Markdown is to create and edit Markdown documents, and MWeb's Folders mode does this. It supports the following features: * Create Markdown, Textbundle documents, or simply open them for editing. * Introduce a folder with Markdown documents into the Folders mode of MWeb. MWeb will provide practical functions such as management of Markdown documents, full-text search, copy and paste to insert images, and unified storage of referenced images. * iPadOS/iOS version supports Dropbox folders. ## Library mode Markdown is so easy to use, so taking notes is also in great demand. Of course, you can use Folders mode and introduce a folder to take notes, which is also very nice and easy to share. So why do we still create a separate Library mode? Mainly, the Library mode has the following features: * There is no need to consider the file name, title and storage location, Just create note and writing. * Use category trees and tags to manage notes. A single note can be classified into multiple categories, making it easier to set categories for notes. * Organizing notes is more convenient. When moving categories and notes, renaming categories will not affect each other. You don't need to worry about incorrect associations between notes, incorrect reference location of images and attachments in notes, etc. * Complete cross-device synchronization using iCloud CloudKit technology. * The Library follows the "local first" principle and is stored in a folder, very easy for backup. Even if you use iCloud sync, your Library can be completely backed up locally. * Export the entire category of notes to PDF or Epub e-book. * The macOS version of MWeb Pro also supports generating static blogs from categories. The generated blog fully supports math formulas, mermaid, echarts etc. Allows you to create your own blog in a very simple way. ## More features... * Publish documents or notes to Wordpress, Metaweblog API, Evernote, Blogger, Tumblr, Yuque, sspai Matrix, Ghost and Medium. * Upload images in documents or notes to imgur, Qiniu, SM.MS, Tencent COS, Youpai, Alibaba OSS, custom API, etc. * Export documents or notes to PDF (with Table of Contents in macOS version). * Export documents or notes to Epub or image. Hope you enjoy MWeb!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Super PhotoCut
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$8.99 â†’ $4.99 [$4.99 ~ $8.99]ï¼‰

Application Description

***On sale for a limited time. Original USD $29.99*** Super PhotoCut interactive cutout tool isolates and separates a detailed foreground object from photos. With our proprietary best-in-class algorithm masking tool, you can instantly remove complex image backgrounds and make them transparent with just a few clicks. Get the dramatic stand-out images done in seconds-to-minutes instead of minutes-to-hours. Unlike those image processing software in the market, Super PhotoCut doesn't require any special technical skills. You just need mark the object with a rectangle to obtain the desired result. Super PhotoCut will automatically cut objects out for you. Super PhotoCut speeds up your design process, enhance your design time and improves the quality of your photos! It will save you hours that you usually spent on cutting out an object using Photoshop. It is time to say goodbye to the PhotoShop lasso and magic wand tool. Key Features: 1 Instantly and Accurately remove complex background from images. 2 Smart Algorithm: Cuts object out with critical precision. It enables extremely fast operation with great results on any image, minimizing the amount of work you need to put in. 3 Supports almost all image formats: JPG,BMP,PNG,GIF,Raw... 4 Separate foreground from background easily. Live preview the final effect. 5 Transparency Processing Supported. Export to Transparent PNG images. 6 20 kinds of background transition effects are for your choices: Disc Blur, Gaussian Blur, Box Blur, Motion Blur, Zoom Blur, Color Controls, Exposure Adjust, Gamma Adjust, Hue Adjust, Vibrance, Color Invert, Color Posterize, Chrome, Fade, Instant, Mono, Process, Transfer, Sepia Tone, Vignette, Vignette Effect. 7 Zoom to any level necessary allows you to inspect details while quickly navigating your image. 8 Create isolated images with colored or transparent backgrounds. Or import your favorite picture as the background image. 9 Undo / Redo: never fear that a mistake will ruin your work. 10 Configurable Auto-Brush-Size: The mark size adapts dynamically to your zoom level so that you can easily zoom in to make detailed edits. Increase conversion rates with stunning product photos that conform to eBay and Amazon requirements at a little cost. People all over the world are more productive with Super PhotoCut. Try it out today! Feedback: Any suggestion will be highly appreciated. Support email: market@effectmatrix.com

entry.title: Audio Normalizer - Mp3 Gain
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$19.99 â†’ $4.99 [$4.99 ~ $19.99]ï¼‰

Application Description

Audio Normalizer provides a batch normalizing feature that helps users to balance all the music and audio files to equal volume in the most popular audio formats like MP3, M4A, WAV, AAC, FLAC, WMA, AIFF, AMR, AC3, MP2, OGG, M4R, AU etc with high accuracy and at maximum speed with a single click. Is it annoying to adjust the volume of each file individually? Download Audio Normalizer for Mac now. Audio Normalizer Features: 1 Equalize multi-audio files to the same volume with a single click. 2 Leveling the volume of MP3, M4A, WAV files directly losslessly. 3 Supports many popular audio formats: MP3, M4A, WAV, AAC, FLAC, WMA, AIFF, AMR, AC3, MP2, OGG, M4R, AU files. 4 Supports batch processing. 5 You can custom volume level. 6 Awesome Usability: Easy to use through a modern and clear user interface. Please note that volume of DRM-protected files can not be analyzed and adjusted. Audio Normalizer Feedback: Any suggestion will be appreciated, email us at: market@effectmatrix.com

entry.title: Vythm VJ - Music Visualizer DJ
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • All features and modesï¼š$44.99 â†’ $29.99 [$29.99 ~ $44.99]

Application Description

--- Experience Your Music with Vythm --- Unlock the potential of music visualization with Vythm! Vythm is a versatile music visualization app that allows you to create visual artworks in harmony with your selected music. It includes a variety of unique visualization modes, including Equalizer, Mandala, Shapes, Fluids, Psychedelic, Dreaming, and more. Choose a background and apply image effects to personalize your visualization completely. --- Your Vision, Your Visualization --- Vythm provides you with numerous options to realize your creative vision: - Over 100 carefully selected backgrounds. - MIDI input for precise visual control. - NDI streaming support for sharing your creations. - Real-time image effects like color correction, bloom, chromatic aberration, and more. - Size, rotation, and orientation adjustments. And much more! The Equalizer, Rhythm, and Peer modes are available for free, while other modes can be unlocked through a subscription. --- Input Formats --- Select your music from a variety of sources: - Import any mp3 or m4a files. - Access your iTunes library (Please note that Apple Music is not currently supported). - Utilize your device's microphone, with sensitivity adjustments for various use cases. - Enjoy three preselected songs for quick inspiration. --- Record Your Masterpiece --- Vythm offers a recording feature that enables you to share or save your creations. Revisit your immersive visual world at your convenience or dazzle your audience with your artistic masterpiece. --- Share Your Thoughts --- Our top priority is to provide you with the best possible experience. If you encounter issues or have ideas for new features, please do not hesitate to contact us at info@mkgames.org. If you enjoy the app, we would greatly appreciate your feedback and a review! Thank you for choosing Vythm! Download and experience Vythm (Music Visualization 2024 / Audio Visualizer) today! Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Application Description

*** Apple Design Award Winner 2024 *** Welcome to djay! The #1 DJ app and winner of multiple Apple Design Awards now integrates with Apple Music - mix over 100 million songs instantly! djay transforms your iOS device into a full-featured DJ system. Seamlessly integrated with your music library, djay allows you to mix your favorite songs and playlists. You can perform live, remix tracks, or enable Automix mode to let djay create a seamless mix for you automatically. Whether you are a professional DJ or a beginner who just loves to play with music, djay offers you the most intuitive yet powerful DJ experience on an iOS device. HARDWARE INTEGRATION â€¢ Plug-and-play integration with over 100 MIDI controllers by Pioneer DJ, Reloop, Hercules, Numark, Denon DJ, and more â€¢ Digital Vinyl System (DVS) Integration â€¢ Advanced MIDI Learn to map any class-compliant MIDI controller â€¢ Support for Bluetooth audio and MIDI â€¢ Support for multi-channel USB audio interfaces and video output POWERFUL AUDIO ENGINE â€¢ Ableton Link integration â€¢ Fluid Beatgrid â€¢ High-res waveforms BUILT FOR iOS â€¢ Accessible via VoiceOver â€¢ Airplay, Live Photos, Apple Watch, and iCloud integration â€¢ Haptic Feedback, Drag & Drop, Keyboard Shortcuts â€¢ Multi-Tasking: Slide Over and Split View support Top features of the optional Pro subscription include: â€¢ Unlimited access to an extensive library of samples, loops, FX, and visuals â€¢ Neural Mixâ„¢ â€¢ Sampler & Looper â€¢ Automix â€¢ Crossfader FX â€¢ Video Mixing â€¢ Music Visualizers â€¢ Single Deck mode â€¢ 4-Deck mode â€¢ Advanced media library editing â€¢ Pre-cueing with headphones â€¢ Hardware integration (MIDI controllers, DVS, multi-channel audio interfaces) â€¢ 7-day free trial: free access to all djay Pro content and features for one week, cancel anytime The optional PRO subscription allows you to subscribe once and use djay Pro across all your Mac and iOS devices, including access to all PRO features, as well as 1000+ loops, samples, and visuals.
